Biography

2023-24 – Freshman: Redshirt season, did not see any action.

At Bishop Grimes High School – Scored 506 points during his senior campaign with the Cobras… appeared in all 22 games and scored in double figures in 21 games… scored at least 20 points in 16 of the team’s contests, and scored at least 30 points in five different games… produced a double-double of 30 points and 10 rebounds with three steals during a six-point loss to Christian Brothers Academy (Jan 13) … tallied 32 points, nine rebounds, three assists, one block and five steals during a 72-65 win over Seton Catholic (Jan 16) … registered 30 points, eight rebounds, five assists and two steals during an 81-80 setback at Amsterdam (Feb 5) … recorded 33 points, eight rebounds, three assists, two blocks and four steals during a win over Syracuse Academy of Science (Feb 10) … poured in a season-high 39 points with 14 made field goals, including three makes from three-point land, three assists and three steals during a loss to New Hartford in the Section III Class A Semifinals (Feb 24) … was named to the Section III Class A All-Tournament Team… Garang was chosen as a finalist for the 2022-23 All-CNY Boys Basketball Large School Player of the Year
